```{r}

library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(terra)
library(raster)
library(mapview)

chm <- rast(here("data/chm.tif"))

plot(chm)

```

Try classifying trees into height bins

```{r}

for(threshold in seq(5, 40, 5)){
  
  plot(chm > threshold, main = paste0(">", threshold, "m"))
  
}

```
